validations.password-not-valid: Password must contain 8 or more characters with at least one of each: uppercase, lowercase, number and special
validations.password-contain-1-lower-case-letter: Password must contain at least 1 lower case letter
validations.password-contain-1-upper-case-letter: Password must contain at least 1 upper case letter
validations.password-contain-1-number: Password must contain at least 1 number
validations.password-contain-1-special-character: Password must contain at least 1 special character
